About Me

Here's a bit about myself and what I do:

My name is Chris, and I'm a self-motivated and dynamic front-end web developer with a detailed history of working collaboratively to deliver results. I hold a certificate in Web Programming from Harvard University in addition to a Bachelor of Arts in Music, and I have a passion for learning new tools and technologies.

My favorite web development project is a React & Firebase smart shopping list app that I helped build with three other talented developers at The Collab Lab.

Skills: JavaScript, React, HTML/CSS, SASS, Python, Django, Git/Github, Adobe Photoshop & Lightroom, Commercial Photography, & Music.

I'm interested in web development opportunities using React.

Harvard University (edx.org)

I have earned a professional certificate in computer science for web programming through Harvard University. This was a 6 month self-paced program which consisted of the classes CS50 & CS50 web.

Other Web Development Classes

  • Intro to Programming - Epicodus
  • Modern HTML & CSS From the Beginning - Udemy
  • Modern Javascript From the Beginning - Udemy

B.A. in Music

I have earned a bachelor of arts degree in music from the University of Oregon.
